item.title: Minneapolis ICE shooting live updates: Officer in shooting injured in June incident
item.description: Tensions are flaring in Minneapolis after an Immigration and Customs Enforcement officer fatally shot a 37-year-old woman on Wednesday.

item.title: Fatal ICE shooting prompts questions on 'reasonable use of force': Experts
item.description: Investigation continues into the fatal shooting of a woman accused of ramming an ICE agent in Minneapolis.
